import React from 'react' import Footer from '../landing_page/footer' import Navbar from '../landing_page/navbar' import { useLocation } from 'react-router' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useHistory } from 'react-router' import Back_to_top from '../landing_page/back_to_top' const BeTutor = () => { let path = useLocation(); const history = useHistory() return ( <>
Hi Tutor, Thank you for your interest in teaching with us
Create a Tutors' portal

Over 500,000 Students

Why you should teach with us

  • Learning easy by studying right from the comfort of your home or wherever.
  • Teaching more fun and monetary as tutors can upload there materials and millions of students can access them.
  • Learning in general fun.

Reach your goal.

  • Learning easy by studying right from the comfort of your home or wherever.
  • Teaching more fun and monetary as tutors can upload there materials and millions of students can access them.
  • Learning in general fun.
) } export default BeTutor
